website_summaries.verdict: If you're into its retro sci-fi looks, the FM-enabled Rain Design iWoofer speaker system makes a useful desktop companion for your iPod.
pros: Creative sci-fi design with cool LED lights
includes subwoofer (with decent bass at higher volumes)
cons: cannot adjust viewing angle of iPod
no visual indicators for volume, bass, and FM

customer_reviews.title: Well made and designed
customer_reviews.text: It fits My iPhone XS in a Silk Kung Fu Grip case. It elevates the phone 2.25" at a good angle, doesn't tip, and has a hole in the back for a charging cable. It's on my desk about 2 ft. from my head and Face ID works fine. The phone sits above a partial ledge that channels the bottom speaker sound upward. I'm not an audiophile, but the phone sounds good in the stand. Like my matching laptop mStand, It's beautifully designed and very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Amazing built, however iPad Pro 12.9 in landscape mode will NOT fit!
customer_reviews.text: I loved how sturdy and great quality the aluminum of this product is. However, the black plastic feels a bit thin. I was disappointed that it does NOT FIT iPad Pro 12.9 in landscape mode, which was the main reason I bought it. I want to have the versatility to use it landscape or portrait while being secure. Hopefully they’ll take this into consideration for the upgraded mode.
customer_reviews.author: JC Feliciano

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Does just what it says and the pictures ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Does just what it says and the pictures show. The space grey is a perfect match for Apple's 15" MacBook Pro with touchbar. I'm using this to hold my iPad Pro as a second display with Duet Display.
customer_reviews.author: ebfoxbat

customer_reviews.title: Very nice except for one thing
customer_reviews.text: Very nice except for one thing. The top slides up/down to hold the iPad in place. You just lift it to remove the iPad and reposition it portrait or landscape, then push it down. The slider does not lock in. There are 2 screws but they cannot be tightened if you want to lock it in place. I ended up putting some tape around the bars that slide in to add some resistance and it works fine for me. I recommend they add a couple optional screws to the packaging to allow you to tighten it down, especially if you will seldom every remove the iPad from the stand.
customer_reviews.author: space1nvaders

customer_reviews.title: Love it for iPad 2nd gen & iPhone 11ProMax
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to go with companion swivel mStand laptop for a SurfaceBook. Holds my ipad and iPhone perfectly. Great for working from home. I can now put both next to my iMac and (I hope) make the iMac an external monitor for video meetings. At any rate an elegant way to raise up your iPad and/or iPhone to a variety of angles and free your hands to do other things. Love Rain's products!
customer_reviews.author: Ruivano

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend if you appreciate quality and functionality
customer_reviews.text: I don't write many reviews - so simply taking the time to write about this says a lot. My First Rain Design purchase, and I am very impressed with the craftsmanship and quality. I'm using this as an IPAD PRO 12" tablet combined with my MacBook Pro and Duet as a 2nd display. Functional - safe, easy to use and lots great on my office desk with my Space Gray MBP. Highly Recommend if you appreciate quality and functionality Would definitely recommend and will be looking at other Rain Design products
customer_reviews.author: Richard Heruska

customer_reviews.title: Perfect accessory for the iPad
customer_reviews.text: Perfect accessory for the iPad. Clean design, holds the iPad at just the right height and just the right angle. Do your neck a favor and hang your pad on this stand! Excellent quality, good value and outstanding utility.
customer_reviews.author: OldGeezer

customer_reviews.title: Love This Stand!
customer_reviews.text: I have an identical stand for my laptop, which I have had for years. This one is identical only smaller. Excellent quality - very practical. The only thing that would help is if the height was adjustable to be able to reach eye level as needed (for proper head/neck positioning), when viewing something of longer length.
customer_reviews.author: ToBeHonest.....

customer_reviews.title: Solid and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My 12.9" iPad would'nt get used nearly as much without this solid stand. I like that it can be used with a thin silicon case and how visually pleasing it is. Three things I wish this stand had 1: More height adjustments 2: The top that secures iPad clicked into place 3. White cradle option instead of black
customer_reviews.author: basal

customer_reviews.title: Great design; does not fit iPad
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful design. I have one for a MacBook Pro. This one fits my iPhone but not my husband’s iPad which is what I ordered it for. My own fault I guess for not reading the fine print, but the ad is misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Karen D.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Attractive style and sturdy product. I would have given it a 5 stars if it is less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: K. W.

customer_reviews.title: Solid, stable and aesthetically pleasing
customer_reviews.text: This stand is great to look at and is very well made. I needed something to use with my Macbook Air and pair with my iPad for use as a second screen using Sidecar, and this works just great paired with the mStand.
customer_reviews.author: M. Winterroth

customer_reviews.title: It works exactly as I expected
customer_reviews.text: I love these stands. It holds my phone just exactly as I expected. It is sturdy and good looking. Excellent materials and workmanship. I would buy it again if I ever needed one, but it should last a lifetime as it is.
customer_reviews.author: B.P.

customer_reviews.title: Strong and well built. Can't beat it for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This iPad stand is great and although I've never had other stands like this one for the money I have to say that you really can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Aleks Pausak

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: Great design and great to work from. More so it helps reduce the strain on you neck and back, by making you look up instead of down. Once you have the swivel you can't live without it. Quality design and materials.....I now have bought 2 for different locations.
customer_reviews.author: OkJAB

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy stand.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great stand And I can use it for my iPhone too. It is more solid than my last kind. Great to use on planes.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Goss

customer_reviews.title: Got this product to avoid 'phone neck' when using tablet ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this product to avoid 'phone neck' when using tablet. Very stable and adjustable angle, with non-scratching base which is safe and to place on any surface.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: excellent, sturdy, attractive. more robust than other similar products from other brands. It fits my iphone 6 even with its rubber cover. helpful outlets for both the phone jack and the charger. excellent design
customer_reviews.author: HM

customer_reviews.title: Elegant effiencey
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what you pay for. Fantastic for anyone looking for a sleek way to organize your desk space without losing any actual space on the tabletop. The hinge is quiet and firm allowing even a larger heavier 12.9 iPad Pro with a case to sit comfortably without fail. 100% recomenned this product for any one wanting to take their workspace to another level of organization.
customer_reviews.author: Hayden Palmer

customer_reviews.title: It’s good...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, just wish it held my iPad at the same angle as my mStand laptop stand.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Olson

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition to Any iPad!
customer_reviews.text: Love this for our IPad. A little big for travel, but perfect for the kitchen table!
customer_reviews.author: Maine Coaster

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother buying the cheap ones... not ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't bother buying the cheap ones... not worth it ... this one is bigger and heavier to hold your phone properly
customer_reviews.author: AHM

customer_reviews.title: Rain Design has a great smartphone stand that a lot of companies are now copying
customer_reviews.text: I'm pleased with it. Just waiting for a model update that includes wireless charging functionality. That would be icing on the cake.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian S.

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality and it looks great! I'm really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CMM1984

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this phone stand!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! Can't believe I waited this long to get it. I especially love that it is at an angle where facial recognition is immediate. Really happy with this. Looks great on the desk!
customer_reviews.author: Wooderson

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: I love this stand and use it while DJing. It looks great and functions great!
customer_reviews.author: Nate Long

customer_reviews.title: Super stoked with this iPad stand
customer_reviews.text: Super stoked with this iPad stand, matches my Rain laptop stand perfectly, they look sexy side by side, and keeps the viewing angle proportianate with my laptop. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT work with a case.
customer_reviews.text: Note...this stand will not work well with cases in general. It won’t work with Lifeproof cases in particular...even the really small/thin ones.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Home Use
customer_reviews.text: Great for the big iphone 7, especially to reference regularly on the kitchen counter. Great angle - you'll love it!
customer_reviews.author: Officer Friendly

customer_reviews.title: Gamechanger
customer_reviews.text: The perfect desk accessory for any iPad user that needs desk space. So many benefits to hand free tablet surfing with multitasking at work. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Awesome products
customer_reviews.text: This holder is awesome!! Holds my iPhone 8 perfectly and I can charge it while it’s in the holder
customer_reviews.author: Crystal S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Dimensions
customer_reviews.text: Just superb! Great value add. The stand is very versatile. Size and dimensions are perfect for desk use, allowing for more comfortable viewing
customer_reviews.author: Jason lee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely brilliant look really schmick sitting next to my MacBook Pro
customer_reviews.author: Paola Dal-Martello

customer_reviews.title: excellent stand !
customer_reviews.text: Great looking stand - follows the style of apple products so looks great on a desk with them!
customer_reviews.author: fishman

product_meta.title: Rain Design mStand Tablet, Gold
product_meta.description: Style:Tablet| Color:GoldDesigned to uplift. Mstand tablet Plus with angle adjustment, supports iPad and free your hand, so you can work comfortably with touching, swiping, typing or simply enjoy a relaxing video chat.
feature_bullets: Angled stand provides a comfortable view. Cable outlet for easy management
Fits all iPad and compatible with most 13-inch and smaller tablets
Holds iPad in portrait or landscape mode. Fits iPad with or without Apple Smart Cover and case
Acoustic base provides clearer sound by channeling sound from iPad's down-facing speaker forward

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars151 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
